items.text: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
items.plainText: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,

items.text: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,

items.text: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
items.plainText: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

items.text: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
items.plainText: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

items.text: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
items.plainText: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

items.text: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
items.plainText: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

items.text: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
items.plainText: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

items.text: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
items.plainText: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

items.text: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
items.plainText: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.

items.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
items.plainText: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

items.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
items.plainText: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.

items.text: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
items.plainText: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,

items.text: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
items.plainText: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

items.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
items.plainText: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

items.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
items.plainText: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

items.text: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
items.plainText: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.

items.text: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
items.plainText: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.

items.text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.
items.plainText: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.

items.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
items.plainText: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

items.text: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
items.plainText: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,

items.text: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
items.plainText: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

items.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
items.plainText: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.

items.text: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
items.plainText: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,

items.text: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
items.plainText: Eber, Peleg, Reu,

items.text: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
items.plainText: Serug, Nahor, Terah,

items.text: Abram; the same is Abraham.
items.plainText: Abram; the same is Abraham.

items.text: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
items.plainText: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.

items.text: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
items.plainText: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,

items.text: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
items.plainText: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,

items.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
items.plainText: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.

items.text: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
items.plainText: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.

items.text: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
items.plainText: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.

items.text: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
items.plainText: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.

items.text: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
items.plainText: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.

items.text: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
items.plainText: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

items.text: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
items.plainText: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

items.text: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.
items.plainText: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

items.text: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.
items.plainText: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.

items.text: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
items.plainText: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

items.text: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
items.plainText: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.

items.text: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
items.plainText: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.

items.text: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
items.plainText: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

items.text: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
items.plainText: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

items.text: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
items.plainText: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.

items.text: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
items.plainText: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.

items.text: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
items.plainText: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.

items.text: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
items.plainText: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.

items.text: And when Shaul was dead, Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
items.plainText: And when Shaul was dead, Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.

items.text: And when Baal-hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
items.plainText: And when Baal-hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

items.text: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
items.plainText: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,

items.text: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
items.plainText: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,

items.text: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
items.plainText: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,

items.text: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
items.plainText: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
